Project_Title: Small RNA-seq of small extracellular vesicles secreted by Zika virus (ZIKV)-infected JEG-3 trophoblast cells (human)
Project_Description:
Comparison of microRNA profiles of small extracellular vesicles isolated from mock- vs. ZIKV-infected JEG-3 cells.
Overall design: miRNA-seq
